meta.name: Channel banks
meta.brief: A sparse series of channel banks.

meta.name: Channel Bank
meta.brief: A single channel bank, holding up to 128 Channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single FM or DMR channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the reception frequency.
meta.description: Frequency is specified in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency Offset
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit frequency offset.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in 10Hz. The offset direction is stored separately.

meta.name: Repeater direction
meta.brief: Specifies the offset direction for the repeater mode.

item.name: Simplex
item.description: RX = TX Frequency

item.name: Positive
item.description: TX = RX + Offset

item.name: Negative
item.description: TX = RX - Offset

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.brief: Specifies the bandwidth of the FM channel. DMR channels are always 12.5kHz wide.

meta.name: Transmit power
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit power of the channel.

meta.name: Channel mode
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Enable RX only
meta.brief: If enabled, no transmission is possible on this channel.

meta.name: Swap RX/TX frequencies
meta.brief: Also swaps signaling.

meta.name: TX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: RX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: Custom CTCSS frequency
meta.brief: Specifies a custom CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Two-tone decode index
meta.brief: Specifies the two-tone decode index.

meta.name: Transmit contact index
meta.brief: Contact index, 0-based.

meta.name: FM PTT ID transmission mode
meta.brief: Specifies when to transmit the FM PTT id.

meta.name: Admit Criterium
meta.brief: This is a mess. Similar admid criteria for FM and DMR are encoded differently. E.g., channel free and different CC/tone.

item.name: Channel Free
item.description: DMR: channel Free, FM: different CTCSS/DCS tone.

item.name: Different color code
item.description: DMR: different CC; FM: channel free

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.brief: Scan list index, 0-based. 0xff = None
meta.description: None = 0xff.

meta.name: Group List index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list 0-based index. 0xff = None.
meta.description: A 0-based index of the group list. If not set, 0xff.

meta.name: Two-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: Five-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: DTMF Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based.

meta.name: AES encryption key index
meta.brief: Index + 1, 0=Off.

meta.name: Exclude Channel from Roaming
meta.brief: If enabled, the channel gets excluded from roaming.

meta.name: Enable Simplex
meta.brief: Enables the simplex mode.
meta.description: That is, RX = TX frequency.

meta.name: DMR APRS channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based DMR APRS channel setting index. A value in [0,7].

meta.name: Frequency correction
meta.brief: Specifies the frequency correction in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Advanced Encryption Type
meta.brief: Only relevant, if advanced encryption is enabled.

meta.name: Auto Scan
meta.brief: Enables auto scan.

meta.name: Disable Data ACK
meta.brief: Disables data ACK.

meta.name: FM ARPS Frequency Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the FM APRS frequency.

meta.name: ARC4 Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 key index (if ARC4 is enabled).
meta.description: Valid values are 1-255, 0=Off.

meta.name: Channel extension banks
meta.brief: A series of channel extension banks corresponding to each encoded channel bank.

meta.name: Channel extension bank
meta.brief: Encodes several channel extensions corresponding to each encoded channel.

meta.name: Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index BOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the begin-of-transmission 5 tone PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. Index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index EOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the 5 tone end-of-transmission PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. The index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: VFO Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single FM or DMR VFO channel.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the reception frequency.
meta.description: Frequency is specified in 10Hz.

meta.name: TX Frequency Offset
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit frequency offset.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in 10Hz. The offset direction is stored separately.

meta.name: Repeater direction
meta.brief: Specifies the offset direction for the repeater mode.

item.name: Simplex
item.description: RX = TX Frequency

item.name: Positive
item.description: TX = RX + Offset

item.name: Negative
item.description: TX = RX - Offset

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.brief: Specifies the bandwidth of the FM channel. DMR channels are always 12.5kHz wide.

meta.name: Transmit power
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit power of the channel.

meta.name: Channel mode
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Enable RX only
meta.brief: If enabled, no transmission is possible on this channel.

meta.name: Swap RX/TX frequencies
meta.brief: Also swaps signaling.

meta.name: TX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: RX DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: The least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code. The 9th bit encodes the inversion flag.

meta.name: Custom CTCSS frequency
meta.brief: Specifies a custom CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Two-tone decode index
meta.brief: Specifies the two-tone decode index.

meta.name: Transmit contact index
meta.brief: Contact index, 0-based.

meta.name: FM PTT ID transmission mode
meta.brief: Specifies when to transmit the FM PTT id.

meta.name: Admit Criterium
meta.brief: This is a mess. Similar admid criteria for FM and DMR are encoded differently. E.g., channel free and different CC/tone.

item.name: Channel Free
item.description: DMR: channel Free, FM: different CTCSS/DCS tone.

item.name: Different color code
item.description: DMR: different CC; FM: channel free

meta.name: Scan list index
meta.brief: Scan list index, 0-based. 0xff = None
meta.description: None = 0xff.

meta.name: Group List index
meta.brief: Specifies the group list 0-based index. 0xff = None.
meta.description: A 0-based index of the group list. If not set, 0xff.

meta.name: Two-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: Five-tone Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: DTMF Id Index
meta.brief: 0-based.

meta.name: AES encryption key index
meta.brief: Index + 1, 0=Off.

meta.name: Exclude Channel from Roaming
meta.brief: If enabled, the channel gets excluded from roaming.

meta.name: Enable Simplex
meta.brief: Enables the simplex mode.
meta.description: That is, RX = TX frequency.

meta.name: DMR APRS channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based DMR APRS channel setting index. A value in [0,7].

meta.name: Frequency correction
meta.brief: Specifies the frequency correction in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Advanced Encryption Type
meta.brief: Only relevant, if advanced encryption is enabled.

meta.name: Auto Scan
meta.brief: Enables auto scan.

meta.name: Disable Data ACK
meta.brief: Disables data ACK.

meta.name: FM ARPS Frequency Index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the FM APRS frequency.

meta.name: ARC4 Key Index
meta.brief: Specifies the ARC4 key index (if ARC4 is enabled).
meta.description: Valid values are 1-255, 0=Off.

meta.name: VFO Channel extension
meta.brief: Encodes additional channel information.

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index BOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the begin-of-transmission 5 tone PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. Index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: 5 Tone PTT ID index EOT
meta.brief: Specifies the index of the 5 tone end-of-transmission PTT ID to send.
meta.description: The index is 0-based. The index 64h means "custom".

meta.name: Zone channel indices
meta.brief: A fixed sized list of channel indices for the zone.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based channel index.
meta.description: If unset, value is ffffh.

meta.name: Roaming channel bank
meta.brief: Encodes a bank of up to 250 roaming channels.

meta.name: Roaming channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming channel.

meta.name: RX frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the RX frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: TX frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the transmit frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is encoded in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Color code override
meta.brief: Specifies the color code to override the current channels setting with.
meta.description: If set to 16 (10h), there is no override.

meta.name: Time slot override
meta.brief: Specifies if and how the current channels time slot gets overridden.

item.name: None
item.description: If selected, the current channels time slot will not be overridden.

meta.name: Roaming channel bit
meta.brief: Single bit encoding whether a roaming channel is valid.

meta.name: Roaming zone enable bit
meta.brief: Enables a single roaming zone.

meta.name: Roaming zone bank
meta.brief: A collection of up to 64 roaming zones.

meta.name: Roaming zone
meta.brief: Encodes a single roaming.

meta.name: Roaming channel index
meta.brief: 0-based index.
meta.description: If set to 0xff, disabled.

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: Specifies the name of the roaming zone.

meta.name: Primary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Index +1, 0=selected. ffff=none.

meta.name: Secondary Priority Channel Index
meta.brief: Index +1, 0=selected, ffff=none

meta.name: Primary Look Back Time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Secondary Look Back Time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Dropout delay
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Dwell time
meta.brief: in 10sec.

meta.name: Channel Index
meta.brief: Index 0-based, ffffh=disabled

meta.name: Message enable byte
meta.brief: Enables a specific message.

meta.name: Channel frequency
meta.brief: Specified in multiples of 100Hz

meta.name: VFO frequency
meta.brief: Specified in multiples of 100Hz

meta.name: Tone duration
meta.brief: Duration is encoded in ms. Valid values are 30ms - 100ms.

meta.name: ID
meta.brief: Up to 40 digits

meta.name: Digit
meta.brief: Encodes a single ID digit.

meta.name: Symbol Interval
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15.

meta.name: Group Code
meta.brief: Valid values 0-15

meta.name: Tone Delay
meta.brief: Tone delay in 10ms.

meta.name: First digit duration
meta.brief: Duration in 10ms.

meta.name: Auto Reset Time
meta.brief: In multiple of 10s.

meta.name: Post-tone delay.
meta.brief: Delay in multiple of 10ms before EOT.

meta.name: PTT Id Pause
meta.brief: Pause between PTT Id transmissions in multiple of 10s.

meta.name: D-Code Pause
meta.brief: In seconds.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id
meta.brief: Encodes a single 2-tone id.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the tone frequency in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Name
meta.brief: The name of the id.

meta.name: 2-Tone Id bitmap
meta.brief: Specifies, which 2-tone id is valid.

meta.name: First tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the first tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500-10000ms.

meta.name: Second tone duration
meta.brief: Specifies the second tone duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 500ms - 10000ms.

meta.name: Long tone duration
meta.brief: Encodes the duration in terms of 100ms. Valid values are 500 - 10000ms.

meta.name: Gap duration
meta.brief: Encodes the gap duration in multiples of 100ms. Valid values are 0 - 2000ms.

meta.name: Reset period
meta.brief: Encodes the reset period in seconds. Valid values are 0 - 250s.

meta.name: Side tone
meta.brief: Enables side tone.

meta.name: Hidden zone bit
meta.brief: If enabled, the corresponding zone is hidden.

meta.name: DTMF/5Tomn id index
meta.brief: 0-based index of DTMF or 5-tone id.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm transmit duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Must be a 0-based index to an analog channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0 = continuous, otherwise count 1...255.

meta.name: Alarm duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm TX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the TX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm RX duration
meta.brief: Specifies the alarm RX duration in seconds.

meta.name: Alarm channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the index the alarm channel. Must be an index of a DMR channel.

meta.name: Emergency cycle
meta.brief: 0=Continous, else number of cycles.

meta.name: Voice switch broadcast
meta.brief: Some bull shit. Likely a period in minutes+1. Of regular transmissions. That is 0=1m, 1=2m,...

meta.name: Area switch broadcast
meta.brief: Uh, the engineerd absolutely gave a shit. This is some other time interval. This time in seconds+1. That is, 0=1s, 1=2s, ...

meta.name: DMR Encryption Id
meta.brief: ffffh=Invalid.

meta.name: Auto repeater offset frequency bank
meta.brief: Holds up to 250 offset frequencies for the auto-repeater feature.

meta.name: Auto repeater offset frequencies
meta.brief: The actual list of exactly 250 offset frequencies.

meta.name: Offset frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the absolute value of the offset frequency.
meta.description: The frequency is encoded as multiples of 10Hz. If 0=disabled.

meta.name: 2-Tone functions
meta.brief: Encodes up to 16 two-tone functions.

meta.name: First tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the first tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Second tone frequency
meta.brief: Encodes the frequency of the second tone.
meta.description: The value is stored in multiples of 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Key Id
meta.brief: 1-based key Id. 0=Off.

meta.name: Key Size
meta.brief: Specifies the key-size in nibbles (multiples of 4bit).

meta.name: Display Mode
meta.brief: Speficies the channel display mode. That is name or frequency.

meta.name: Auto-shutoff delay
meta.brief: Specifies the time period afer wich the radio shuts off.

meta.name: Transmit Timeout
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit time out in multiples of 30s.
meta.description: Valid values are Off (0), 30s, ..., 240s.

meta.name: Frequency step size
meta.brief: Specifies the frequency step size.

meta.name: Squelch Level VFO A
meta.brief: Specifies the squelch level for VFO A.
meta.description: Valid values are Off, 1, ..., 5, where 0=Off.

meta.name: Squelch Level VFO B
meta.description: Valid values are Off, 1, ..., 5, where 0=Off.

meta.name: VFO Scan Type
meta.brief: Specifies if and when a scan continues.

item.name: Fixed Time
item.description: Continues after a fixed time period.

item.name: Carrier
item.description: Continues once the carrier is gone.

item.name: Stop
item.description: Stops the scan after the first signal is recieved.

meta.name: DMR mic gain
meta.brief: Specifies the DMR microphone gain.
meta.description: Valid values are [1, ..., 5], encoded as n + 1. That is, 0=1, ..., 4=5.

meta.name: STE type
meta.brief: Specifies the squelch tail elemination type.

meta.name: STE Frequency
meta.brief: Squelch tail elemination frequency.

meta.name: Group call hang time
meta.brief: Specifies hang time in seconds. That is. 0=1s, ..., 29=30s, 30=30min, 31=infinite.

meta.name: Private call hang time
meta.brief: Specifies hang time in seconds. That is. 0=1s, ..., 29=30s, 30=30min, 31=infinite.

meta.name: Preamble duration
meta.brief: Specifies the preamble duration in multiples of 60ms.

meta.name: FM broadcast channel index
meta.brief: Specifies the pre-set FM broadcast channel.

meta.name: Boot Zone A
meta.brief: When work mode for VFO A is set to Channel, this index specifies the zone. 0-based zone index.

meta.name: Boot Zone B
meta.brief: When work mode for VFO B is set to Channel, this index specifies the zone. 0-based zone index.

meta.name: Enable FM broadcast monitor
meta.brief: If set to 1, radio calls are received while listening to the FM broadcast.

meta.name: Display Brightness
meta.brief: Possible values [0-4].

meta.name: Enable FM broadcast monitor
meta.brief: If set to 1, radio calls are received while listening to the FM broadcast.

meta.name: Main VFO
meta.brief: Specifies, which VFO is the main one.

meta.name: Time Zone
meta.description: How about encoding it as a singed integer in multiples of 5min? Also, UTC+13h were you drunk?

meta.name: DMR channel free tone
meta.brief: Selects the channel free/idle tone.

meta.name: Menu exit time
meta.brief: Specifies the menu hang time/duartion.
meta.description: The duration is specified in multiples of 5s + 5s. That is, 0=5s, 1=10s, 2=15s, ..., 11=60s.

meta.name: Enable filter own Id
meta.brief: Filters own ID from list of missed calls.

meta.name: Enable call-end notification.
meta.brief: If enabled, a small box is shown at the end of the call.
meta.description: Let us all celebrate this very improtant option.

meta.name: Max speaker volume
meta.brief: Specifies the maximum speaker volume.
meta.description: Valid values are [Indoors, 1, ..., 8]. Where Indoors is encoded as 0.

meta.name: Long press duration
meta.brief: Specifies the duration in n-1 seconds.

meta.name: Show volume bar
meta.brief: Shows the volume bar, when the volume is changed.

meta.name: Last caller display mode
meta.brief: Specifies if and how the last caller is shown.

meta.name: FM Call hold time
meta.brief: Specifies the hold time in seconds. Valid values are 0s, ..., 30s.

meta.name: VFO Scan UHF min Frequency
meta.brief: in 10Hz.

meta.name: VFO Scan UHF max Frequency
meta.brief: in 10Hz

meta.name: VFO Scan VHF min Frequency
meta.brief: in 10Hz

meta.name: VFO Scan VHF max Frequency
meta.brief: in 10Hz.

meta.name: VHF auto-repeater min frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the lower bound of the first VHF auto-repeater frequency range.
meta.description: The freuqency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: VHF auto-repeater max frequency
meta.brief: Speifies the upper bound of the first VHF auto-repeater frequency range.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: UHF auto-repeater min frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the lower bound of the first UHF auto-repeater frequency range.
meta.description: The freuqency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: UHF auto-repeater max frequency
meta.brief: Speifies the upper bound of the first UHF auto-repeater frequency range.
meta.description: The frequency is stored in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.brief: in ms.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.brief: in ms.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.brief: in ms.

meta.name: UHF Auto-repeater offset frequency 1 index
meta.brief: The 0-based index of the offset frequency.
meta.description: If set to ffh, disabled.

meta.name: VHF Auto-repeater offset frequency index.
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based index of the offset frequency.
meta.description: If set to ffh, disables the auto-repeater feature.

meta.name: Priority zone index A
meta.brief: Specifies the zone 0-based index for the priority zone of VFO A. If none is set, set to ffh.

meta.name: Priority zone index B
meta.brief: Specifies the zone 0-based index for the priority zone of VFO B. If none is set, set to ffh.

meta.name: Enable bluetooth
meta.brief: If set to 1, blue tooth is enabled.

meta.name: Bluetooth and internal mic
meta.brief: If set to 1, the bluetooth and internal mic are used.

meta.name: Bluetooth and internal speaker.
meta.brief: If set to 1, blue tooth and the internal speaker are used.

meta.name: Enable plug-in recording tone
meta.brief: Whatever that is. Here you can enable it.

meta.name: Ranging interval
meta.brief: Specifies the ranging interval in seconds. Valid values are [5,255].
meta.description: No offset. Nobody gave a f**k. I wonder, what happens if one sets it to 0.

meta.name: Bluetooth mic gain
meta.brief: Specifies the microphone gain for the blue tooth source.
meta.description: Valid values are 1-5, encoded as 0-4. That is, 0=1, ..., 4=5.

meta.name: Bluetooth speaker gain
meta.brief: Specifies the speaker gain for the blue tooth output.
meta.description: Valid values are 1-5, encoded as 0-4. That is, 0=1, ..., 4=5.

meta.name: Channel number mode
meta.brief: WTF, really? Specifies whether the total or within-zone number is show as the channel number.
meta.description: It makes absolutely no sense to show a total channel number, dear AnyTone engineer. The user can only access channels through a zone. So, if a channel is not assigned to any zone, it is basically hidden. So, explain to me, why should anyone care about the absolute channel number?

meta.name: Enable show current contact
meta.brief: Enables the display of the current contact.
meta.description: Why is the default off? Isn't it a pretty important information?

meta.name: Auto-roaming period
meta.brief: Specifies the auto-roaming period (if enabled) in multiples of 1 minute.
meta.description: The period is stored as n + 1min. That is 0=1min, 1=2min, ..., 255=256min.

meta.name: Call sign color
meta.brief: Specifies the color, the callsign is shown in.
meta.description: Because it is incredible important to be able to set it. Default is orange (0).

meta.name: Units
meta.brief: Dear AnyTone UI translator. It is not "inch system" it is "imperial units".

meta.name: Side key lock
meta.brief: If set, the side keys are locked too.

meta.name: Enable keyboard lock
meta.brief: If enabled, the keyboard is locked.

meta.name: Enable knob lock
meta.brief: If set, the knob is also locked.

meta.name: Roaming delay
meta.brief: Specifies the delay in seconds between a auto-roaming trigger and the actual auto-roaming.
meta.description: Valid values are [None, 1s, 30s], where None is encoded as 0.

meta.name: Standby text color
meta.brief: Another palette. Thanks!
meta.description: Seriously dear AnyTone engineer. Why for f**k sake can't you produce a consistent encoding of colors? It is called copy-and-paste. The produces a lot of code you can impress your supervisor with at zero cost. Give it a try, you gonna love it.

meta.name: Standby background image
meta.brief: Specifies a wallpaper for the radio.
meta.description: Yes, very important feature.

meta.name: Show last caller on boot
meta.brief: If set to 1, shows the last caller after boot.
meta.description: Why do I need to know that? That might be ages ago.

meta.name: SMS standard
meta.brief: Specifies the SMS standard to use.

meta.name: Send selected analog contact
meta.brief: Additionally to own ID, send selected FM destination ID from address book.

meta.name: Enable default boot channel
meta.description: If set to 1, a default channel for VFO A and B is set.

meta.name: Boot zone VFO A
meta.brief: Specifies the zone index for the boot zone.
meta.description: That is, the zone selected for VFO A at boot.

meta.name: Boot zoot VFO B
meta.brief: Default boot zone for VFO B
meta.description: Encodes the 0-based boot zone for the VFO B. That is, the zone being selected at bootup.

meta.name: Default boot channel VFO A
meta.brief: Specifies the channel index within the boot zone.
meta.description: If set to ffh, the VFO is selected.

meta.name: Default boot channel VFO B
meta.brief: Encodes the channel index for the boot channel for VFO B.
meta.description: That is, the 0-based index of the channel within the boot zone B. If ffh is selected, the VFO is selected as the boot channel.

meta.name: Roaming zone index
meta.brief: Specifies the 0-based roaming zone index.

meta.name: Repeater check interval
meta.brief: Specifies the repeater check interval in multuples of 5s. The period is 5s * n + 5s with valid values in 5s - 50s.

meta.name: Repeater check retry count
meta.brief: Number is specified as 3 + n with valid values in [3, 5].

meta.name: Auto-roaming start condition
meta.brief: Specifies, when auto roaming is triggered.

item.name: Periodic
item.description: Auto roaming starts periodically.

item.name: Out-of-range
item.description: Auto roaming starts on out-of-range event.

meta.name: Show menu separator
meta.brief: If set to 1, shows menu separators.

meta.name: Keep last caller
meta.brief: If set to 1, the last caller is kept when the channel is changed.

meta.name: Channel A name color
meta.brief: Specifies the color of the channel name.
meta.description: Because it is incredible important to be able to set it. Default is orange (0).

meta.name: Repeater check OOR notification
meta.brief: Specifies the mode of notification for an out-of-range event.

meta.name: Backlight duration TX
meta.brief: Specifies the duration of the backlight during TX.
meta.description: Encodes the duration in seconds. Valid values are [1,30]. If set to 0, the backlight is disabled during TX.

meta.name: Enable auto roaming
meta.brief: If set to 1, enables auto roaming.

meta.name: Short-press key functions
meta.brief: Functions for programmable keys 1, ..., 6, A, ..., D.

meta.name: Long-press key functions
meta.brief: Functions for programmable keys 1, ..., 6, A, ..., D.

meta.name: Repeater check OOR notification count
meta.brief: Number of notifications for a out-of-range event. The number is specified as n + 1 with an valid value in [1, 10].

meta.name: Bluetooth RX delay
meta.brief: Delay in multiples of 500ms.

meta.name: Zone A & B channels
meta.brief: Encodes for each zone the A & B channel.

meta.name: Channel indices
meta.brief: Channel A indices for all possible zones.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies a 0-based channel index. No special values.

meta.name: Channel indices
meta.brief: Channel B indices for all possible zones.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: Specifies a 0-based channel index. No special values.

meta.name: DTMF Ids
meta.brief: Encodes DTMF PTT ids.

meta.name: DTMF digit
meta.brief: Valid values 0h - fh. If not set, ffh.

meta.name: Boot text line 1
meta.brief: Specifies the first line of the boot text.

meta.name: Boot text line 2
meta.brief: Encodes the second line of the boot text.

meta.name: Boot password
meta.brief: Plain boot password.
meta.description: Although this is an ASCII string, only digits are allowed. That is 30h-39h.

meta.name: FM APRS TX delay
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit FM APRS delay in multiple of 20ms. Valid values are 0-5100ms.

meta.name: FM APRS sub tone type
meta.brief: Specifies the transmit sub-tone for FM APRS.

meta.name: FM APRS DCS code
meta.brief: Encodes the DCS code in a complex way.
meta.description: That is, the least significant 9 bits encode the binary DCS code and 9th bit encodes the inverted flag of DCS.

meta.name: Manual TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the manual TX interval in second. 0: Off, 1-255.

meta.name: Automatic TX interval
meta.brief: Specifies the interval in multiples of 30s. 0:Off. Valid values 30-7650s.

meta.name: APRS monitor enable
meta.brief: Listen to the APRS packet transmission.

meta.name: Latitude degree
meta.brief: Encodes the first position latitude degree value.

meta.name: APRS path string 0-14h
meta.brief: First half of the APRS path string. Contains the first 24 bytes.

meta.name: APRS symbol table
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: APRS symbol
meta.brief: A char!

meta.name: Prewave delay
meta.brief: Specifies the pre-wave delay in multiples of 10ms. Valid values are 0-2550ms.

meta.name: Channel index
meta.brief: 0-based transmit channel. 0fa0=VFO A, 0fa1=VFO B, 0fa2=Current

meta.name: Repeater activation delay
meta.brief: Delay in multiples of 100ms. 0=Off.
meta.description: Valid values are Off, 100ms, ..., 1000ms.

meta.name: APRS path 15h-38h
meta.brief: Second half of the APRS path.

meta.name: APRS Info Display Duration
meta.brief: Specifies the duration in seconds.
meta.description: In fact, it is (n+3) second. If n=13, infinite.

meta.name: Fixed altitude
meta.brief: Encodes the fixed altitude in feet.

meta.name: Status report flag
meta.brief: Sets the "STATUS REPORT" flag.

meta.name: NEMA report flag
meta.brief: Sets the "NEMA REPORT" flag.

meta.name: Weather report flag
meta.brief: Sets the weather report flag.

meta.name: Message flag
meta.brief: Sets the "MESSAGE" flag.

meta.name: Item flag
meta.brief: Sets the "ITEM" flag.

meta.name: Object flag
meta.brief: Set the "OBJECT" flag.

meta.name: Mic-E flag
meta.brief: Sets the "MIC-E" flag.

meta.name: Position Flag
meta.brief: Sets the "POSITION" flag.

meta.name: Other flag
meta.brief: Sets the "OTHER" flag.

meta.name: Enable AX.25 CRC check
meta.brief: If disabled, the all decoded AX.25 frames are processed, even those with invalid CRCs.

meta.name: Enable Repeater
meta.brief: Enables the radio to act as a local repeater.
meta.description: This feature receives on VFO A and transmits on VFO B. VFO A & B can be on the same channel. The repeater receives on one time slot and transmits on the other.

meta.name: Speakers
meta.brief: Specifies the enabled speakers.

meta.name: Microphone Speaker Source
meta.brief: Specifies the source for the speaker on the hand-microphone.

meta.name: Enable bluetooth PTT latch
meta.brief: If set to 1, one press with lattch the PTT and a second press will unlatch the PTT again.

meta.name: Bluetooth PTT sleep delay
meta.brief: Specifies the delay befor the BT PTT button goes into sleep mode.
meta.description: Encodes as minutes. Valid values are [Infinite, 1min, ..., 4min], where 0=Infinite.

meta.name: Fan control
meta.brief: Specifies what controls the fan.

meta.name: Weather channel index
meta.brief: 0-based index.

meta.name: Manual dial group call hang time
meta.brief: Specifies hang time in seconds. That is. 0=1s, ..., 29=30s, 30=30min, 31=infinite.

meta.name: Manual dial private call hang time
meta.brief: Specifies hang time in seconds. That is. 0=1s, ..., 29=30s, 30=30min, 31=infinite.

meta.name: Channel B name color
meta.brief: Specifies the color of the channel name.
meta.description: Because it is incredible important to be able to set it. Default is orange (0).

meta.name: UI Mode
meta.brief: Specifies the freedom in the UI.
meta.description: That is, in amateur mode, you can set a lot of stuff using the radio itself. In professional mode, you are basically locked in.

meta.name: STE duration
meta.brief: Specifies the STE duration in mutliples of 10ms. Valid values are [10ms-1000ms]

meta.name: Microphone Type
meta.brief: Specifies the microphon type used.

meta.name: Zone A name color
meta.brief: Specifies the color of the zone name.
meta.description: Because it is incredible important to be able to set it. Default is orange (0).

meta.name: Zone B name color
meta.brief: Specifies the color of the zone name.
meta.description: Because it is incredible important to be able to set it. Default is orange (0).

meta.name: Disable auto-shutoff timer reset on call
meta.brief: If set to 1, the auto-shutoff timer is not reset by a call.

meta.name: Date format
meta.brief: Specifies the format, the date is shown in.

item.name: Big Endian
item.description: YYYY/MM/DD

item.name: Little Endian
item.description: DD/MM/YYYY

meta.name: FM mic gain
meta.brief: Specifies the FM microphone gain.
meta.description: Valid values are [1, ..., 5], encoded as n + 1. That is, 0=1, ..., 4=5.

meta.name: BT Handset Long-Press Key Functions
meta.brief: Functions for long-press side-keys P1-P3.
meta.description: A long-press is long, if it is at least 1.5s long.

meta.name: BT Handset Mic Gain
meta.brief: Specifies the BT handset microphone amplification level. Valid values are 0, ..., 4.

meta.name: Enable TOT reminder
meta.brief: If set to 1, five seconds before the transmit timeout, a warn tone sounds.

meta.name: Repeater Mode Colorcode
meta.brief: Either the colorcode is ignored or it must match the CC of VFO A or B.

item.name: Any
item.description: Receives on one time slot and transmits on the other.

item.name: TS 1 -> 2
item.description: Receives on time slot 1 and transmits on 2.

item.name: TS 2 -> 1
item.description: Receives on time slot 2 and transmits on 1.

item.name: Any
item.description: Receives on one time slot and transmits on the other.

item.name: TS 1 -> 2
item.description: Receives on time slot 1 and transmits on 2.

item.name: TS 2 -> 1
item.description: Receives on time slot 2 and transmits on 1.

meta.name: BT Handset RX Noise Reduction Level
meta.brief: Specifies the noise reduction level. 0=Off, 1, ..., 9.

meta.name: Enable BT Handset Device Shutdown
meta.brief: If enabled, the radio will shut of if the handset is turned off.

meta.name: BT Handset Very-Long-Press Key Functions
meta.brief: Functions for very-long-press of side keys P1-P3.
meta.description: A long-press is very-long, if it lasts at least 3s.

meta.name: BT Handset TX Noise Reduction Level
meta.brief: Specifies the noise reduction level. 0=Off, 1, ..., 9.

meta.name: BT Handset VOX delay
meta.brief: Specifies VOX delay in multiples of 0.5s. That is (n+1)*0.5s.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.brief: in ms.

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: in Hz.

meta.name: Duration
meta.brief: in ms.

meta.name: Header repetitions
meta.brief: Specifies how often the so-called voice header is repeated. Valid values are 2, ..., 8.

meta.name: APRS filter
meta.brief: Encodes a single APRS filter based on call and SSID.

meta.name: Call
meta.brief: Specifies the call to filter.

meta.name: SSID
meta.brief: Specifies the SSID of the call. Valid values 0h-fh, 10h = Off.

meta.name: GPS roaming zone bank
meta.brief: Encodes up to 32 GPS roaming zones.

meta.name: GPS roaming zone
meta.brief: Encodes a single GPS roaming zone.
meta.description: That is, a position and radio defining a region associated with a certain roaming zone. Whenever the radio enters this region, the associated roaming zone gets selected.

meta.name: Roaming zone index
meta.brief: Specifies the roaming zone index to use. If set to ffh, the zone is disabled.

meta.name: Latitude degree
meta.brief: Specifies the integer part of the latitude in degrees.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-89.

meta.name: Latitude minutes
meta.brief: Encodes the integer latitude minute part.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-59.

meta.name: Latitude centi-minute
meta.brief: Encodes the 1/100th of a minute.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-99.

meta.name: Longitude degrees
meta.brief: Encodes the integer part of the latitude degree.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-179.

meta.name: Longitude minutes
meta.brief: Encodes the longitude minutes.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-59.

meta.name: Longitude centi-minutes
meta.brief: Encodes the 1/100th part of the minute.
meta.description: Valid value range 0-99.

meta.name: Radius
meta.brief: The unit is specified in the setting.

meta.name: Analog Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based index, ffh=none.

meta.name: Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based index, ffffffffh = none.
meta.description: Used for both, FM and DMR contacts.

meta.name: Message Index
meta.brief: 0-based SMS message index or status message index. ffh = none.

meta.name: Key id
meta.brief: Valid values 1-255. 0=Off.

meta.name: Valid contact indices
meta.brief: Some weird contact index map, containing the indices of up to 10000 valid contacts.

meta.name: Contact index
meta.brief: Specifies the index of a valid contact.

meta.name: Call Type
meta.brief: Specifies the call type of the contact.

meta.name: Analog Contact Index
meta.brief: Stores the 0-based index of the i-th entry.
meta.description: If not set, set to ffh.

meta.name: Analog Contact Enable Byte
meta.brief: Inverted bytemap for every contact entry. 0=enabled, ffh = disabled

meta.name: Contact Index
meta.brief: 0-based

meta.name: Frequency
meta.brief: Specifies the channel frequency in multiples of 10Hz.

meta.name: Scan Enable Bit
meta.brief: If set, the corresponding channel is included in the air band scan.

meta.name: DMR ID and Group Call Flag
meta.brief: DMR Id (bcd8be << 1) | GCF

meta.name: DMR ID and Group Call Flag
meta.brief: DMR Id (bcd8be << 1) | GCF

meta.name: Entry Count
meta.brief: Specifies the number of entries in the call-sign database.

meta.name: End-of-database address
meta.brief: Absolute memory address of the end-of-database.

meta.name: Description
meta.brief: A 0-separated list of strings. Containing name, city, call, state, country, comment.
